Member.name: errorMessage
Member.Description: Populated with an errorMessage if there is one.
Member.Summary: Populated with an errorMessage if there is one.

Type.name: QueryDone
Type.Description:
Query is done. errorMessage is NULL if the query has succeeded, not NULL if an error has occurred. See also: StartQuery() Dataplayer:
- Direction: Correlator to client Channel: <serviceId>.Control
Type.Summary: Query is done. errorMessage is NULL if the query has succeeded, not NULL if an error has occurred.

Member.name: errorMessage
Member.Description: Blank on success, otherwise the error message.
Member.Summary: Blank on success, otherwise the error message.

Type.name: Command
Type.Description:
Sent to plugin to perform maintenance operations such as update or delete.
Response event: CommandAck; errorMessage is blank on success, or otherwise a description of the error
Type.Summary: Sent to plugin to perform maintenance operations such as update or delete.

Type.name: ResultEvent
Type.Description:
Response to the StartQuery These will be sent in order until the number requested, in the rowLimit specified, in the StartQuery has been sent. All results will be streamed at once. See also: StartQuery() Dataplayer:
- Direction: Correlator to client

Member.name: rowId
Member.Description: unique Id for each row This is useful if you ned to rerun a query and dont expect the underlying data to change.
Member.Summary: unique Id for each row This is useful if you ned to rerun a query and dont expect the underlying data to change.

Type.name: Store
Type.Description: A specialised simpler kind of command that just populates a new row with values
Type.Summary: A specialised simpler kind of command that just populates a new row with values

Type.name: StartQuery
Type.Description:
Sent to plugin to start a database query. See also: QueryStatus(), ResultSchema(), ResultEvent() Response: QueryStatus(), ResultSchema(), ResultEvent() Dataplayer:
- Direction: Client to correlator.
Type.Summary: Sent to plugin to start a database query.

Member.name: query
Member.Description: Query to run (either query string or name).
Member.Summary: Query to run (either query string or name).
